title: How to Make a Ploughmans Sandwich

steps.headline: Spread the mayonnaise evenly over both slices of bread.
Add a few slices of cheese to one slice of bread.
Spread the Branston Sweet Pickle over the cheese on one slice and over the mayonnaise on the other slice.
Add a slice of tomato over the sweet pickle covered cheese.
Add the iceberg lettuce over the tomato.
Finish off the sandwich by placing one slice of bread over the other.

text: Spread the mayonnaise evenly over both slices of bread.  Add a few slices of cheese to one slice of bread.  Spread the Branston Sweet Pickle over the cheese on one slice and over the mayonnaise on the other slice.  Add a slice of tomato over the sweet pickle covered cheese.  Add the iceberg lettuce over the tomato.  Finish off the sandwich by placing one slice of bread over the other.
